Articles.Content: You may want to add some text to this thread...
No Text but it looks dam good.

No Text but it looks dam good.

thanks, the craft has 2500 D/v once in orbit, flies like a bird, transport up to 6 kerbals ( on Internal seats ) i'm working on improving its performance without touching the design. 110 parts.

I like this design so much I immediately built a copy. There's some pretty ingenious building going on here. I said "didn't know I could do that" a couple of times in the process. Also, it looks like the center of mass should be way ahead of the CoL, but the imbedded delta wings over the -800 tanks pull it forward nicely. Elegant, uncluttered design so far. Well done.
Adding text explaining what it is we are looking at would be nice.
thanks and that's the main propose of sharing these pictures, keep inspire. There's an hidden secret to balance the craft in the nose. i'll share the picture later once my duty its over.
